channel.title: Beta Roadmap [Latest 7/30/2015]
channel.description:
[u]Minimum[/u]
- Routing/Walking; [s]tile based[/s], minimap based, target based. - NPC updating. - Fixed and resizable interface modes.
[u]Optimal[/u]
- Wrap ByteBuf in client specific implementation for special reads/writes. - Read packet meta data from JSON configuration file (asset/packets.json or asset/<service>/packets.json) - Player appearances. - Player public chat. - Player animations.
[u]Stretch[/u]
- Forum login integration.

item.title: Beta Roadmap [Latest 7/30/2015]
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Minimum

  • Routing/Walking; tile based, minimap based, target based.
  • NPC updating.
  • Fixed and resizable interface modes.

Optimal

  • Wrap ByteBuf in client specific implementation for special reads/writes.
  • Read packet meta data from JSON configuration file (asset/packets.json or asset//packets.json)
  • Player appearances.
  • Player public chat.
  • Player animations.

Stretch

  • Forum login integration.

Read full topic
